languages.text: "Ответ мы получим только когда нечестивый морок вновь явится на корабль и заберет в пасть Архиврага новые невинные жертвы".
"We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."
languages.original_text: "Ответ мы получим только когда нечестивый морок вновь явится на корабль и заберет в пасть Архиврага новые невинные жертвы".

traits.locale_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “只有当邪恶的幻影再次出现在船上，把更多无辜的受害者送进混沌大敌的巨口时，我们才会知道答案。”
languages.original_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: “只有当邪恶的幻影再次出现在船上，把更多无辜的受害者送进混沌大敌的巨口时，我们才会知道答案。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous ne le saurons que lorsque cette vision profane réapparaîtra sur le vaisseau et attirera d'autres victimes innocentes dans la gueule du Grand Ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne le saurons que lorsque cette vision profane réapparaîtra sur le vaisseau et attirera d'autres victimes innocentes dans la gueule du Grand Ennemi. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Solo recibiremos la respuesta cuando esa visión inmunda reaparezca en la nave y arrastre a más víctimas inocentes a las fauces del Archienemigo».
languages.original_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: «Solo recibiremos la respuesta cuando esa visión inmunda reaparezca en la nave y arrastre a más víctimas inocentes a las fauces del Archienemigo».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「再び不浄のビジョンがシップに現れ、さらに多くの罪なき犠牲者が渾沌の勢力の口に引きずり込まれるときになって、初めてわかることだ」
languages.original_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: 「再び不浄のビジョンがシップに現れ、さらに多くの罪なき犠牲者が渾沌の勢力の口に引きずり込まれるときになって、初めてわかることだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir bekommen erst eine Antwort, wenn die unheilige Vision wieder auf dem Schiff erscheint und weitere unschuldige Opfer in den Schlund des Erzfeinds zerrt."
languages.original_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Wir bekommen erst eine Antwort, wenn die unheilige Vision wieder auf dem Schiff erscheint und weitere unschuldige Opfer in den Schlund des Erzfeinds zerrt."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."

languages.text: "Bu sorunun cevabını ancak o uğursuz görüntü gemide belirdiğinde ve daha fazla masum kurbanı Şerbaşı'nın pençelerinde sürüklediğinde öğrenebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "We will only have an answer when the unholy vision reappears on the ship and drags off more innocent victims into the jaws of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sorunun cevabını ancak o uğursuz görüntü gemide belirdiğinde ve daha fazla masum kurbanı Şerbaşı'nın pençelerinde sürüklediğinde öğrenebiliriz."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
